system.description: When you seal a bargain with someone in smoke and blood, roll with HEART.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, the bargain displeases the powers you called upon to sanctify the deal; you must perform an act of contrition before you can invoke their influence again.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, you infuse the agreement with demonic force.

On a 7-9, pick 1.

  • All parties intuitively know if the deal is being honored.
  • All parties take +1 ongoing to letting it out while fulfilling the deal.
  • Anyone violating the pact instantly suffers 4-harm (ap).

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, you infuse the agreement with demonic force.

On a 10+, pick 2.

  • All parties intuitively know if the deal is being honored.
  • All parties take +1 ongoing to letting it out while fulfilling the deal.
  • Anyone violating the pact instantly suffers 4-harm (ap).
